description: It is the latest in a string of charges against ex-president Nicolas Sarkozy, which he denies.
title: French ex-president Sarkozy charged with 'criminal conspiracy'
title_page: French ex-president Sarkozy charged with 'criminal conspiracy' - BBC News
maintext: And he is due to go on trial from 17 March to 15 April 2021 over the so-called Bygmalion affair, in which he is accused of having fraudulently overspent in his 2012 presidential campaign. His 2012 re-election bid was unsuccessful.
